title: svAmI enakkiranguvAi (sj)
sahitya:
svAmI ennakiranguvAi saruva kAruNya guru svAmI ennakiranguvAi sakala paripUraNanE


1:  mA kAruNya paran nI karuNaikkaDalum nI sadA aruLum vAn mAtA nI
 caraNam 2    peTrOnum annaiyum nI uTrOnum (shuTramum) nI keTTAlum rakSakan nI sakalamum tA nI
abhayam tA nI aruNI nIti azhagu nI ariyakOn nI ini marakkAmal guru
 caraNam 3    kanitaru tuyar viTakani mari maganena kanivuDan bhuvi igazh guru ciDam pugazh tara
karuNai nIti niraindumE marittuyirttu sakalam akizha param bhuvi nidamagizham anukulamum
magizha samasta uyirgaLum tudiyuDan enru magizha AbhirAm kumAranena varu
